group.name: Live peacefully with Yoga, Meditation, Spirituality Brussels

description:
Dear members, 

With great pleasure and enthusiasm, I take this opportunity to announce that I am going to conduct a session on Vihangam Yoga Brahmavidya and Meditation on 15th March 2014 from 10.30 am to 12.00 pm. Interested people are requested to join. The medium of the instruction will be English language.

Venue: De Zeyp, Van Overbekelaan 164, 1083 Ganshoren, Brussels

How to reach at the spot ?

Take Metro no 2 or 6 from Brussels Gare du Nord/Midi and get down at Simonis. After exiting from the Simonis metro station, take bus no 87 (bus stop in front of the Simonis Metro) and get down at Lowet bus stop. This bus journey should take about 10-15 minutes. From the Lowet bus stop, the De Zeyp is 20-30 meters away.

What to expect ?

The flow of the event will be the following: Initially, I will give brief introduction about what Vihangam Yoga is (since this is introductory session). This will be followed by practicing of Asanas (warm up exercise, sun salutation and various postures), Pranayama (Breathing techniques) and the most important, Meditation. 

The advantages of the Vihangam Yoga meditation are: 

Better sleep
Maintain the blood pressure
Strengthen the nervous system
Lowers stress
Balances emotions
Develop compassion and loves
Terminates addiction to alcohol, smoking and drugs
Brings clarity to the mind
Makes you realize the true form of your inner self etc. etc.

I have learnt Vihangam yoga from the Maharishi Sadafal Deo Ashram in India based at Allahabad (U.P.) and is authorized instructor of yoga and meditation. I have been practicing it from several years. Currently, I am also pursuing my Ph.D in Chemical Engineering from KU Leuven.

What to bring ?

Bring your Yoga mat, a bottle of water, towel and loose clothes to wear

Prerequisite:  None. NO prior yoga experience is needed !!

Price:  Each person is requested to bring 7 euro for the session.

Should you have more questions about the session/event please give me a call at[masked] or email to [masked]

Hope to have a nice and interesting session ahead with you !

Thanking you,

Kind regards,
Manish gupta
name: Introduction session on Vihangam Yoga and meditation at Brussels

group.name: Live peacefully with Yoga, Meditation, Spirituality Brussels

description:
Dear members,

With great pleasure and enthusiasm, I take this opportunity to announce that I am going to conduct a session on Vihangam Yoga Brahmavidya and Meditation (the science of consciousness). Interested people are requested to join. You will also get chance to get friendship with others !!

What to expect ?

The flow of the event will be the following: Initially, I will give brief introduction about what Vihangam Yoga is (since this is introductory session). This will be followed by practicing of Asanas (warm up exercise, sun salutation and various postures), Pranayama (Breathing techniques) and the most important, Meditation.

The advantages of the Vihangam Yoga meditation are:

Better sleep
Maintains the blood pressure
Strengthen the nervous system
Lowers stress
Balances emotions
Develop compassion and loves
Terminates addiction to alcohol, smoking and drugs
Brings clarity to the mind
Makes you realize the true form of your inner self etc. etc.

I have learnt Vihangam yoga from the Maharishi Sadafal Deo Ashram in India based at Allahabad (U.P.) and is authorized instructor of yoga and meditation. I have been practicing it from several years. Currently, I am also pursuing my Ph.D in Chemical Engineering from KU Leuven.

What to bring ?

Bring your Yoga mat, a bottle of water, towel and loose clothes to wear

Price: Each person is requested to bring 8 euro for the session. Money will be used for renting the room and rest will go for charity !!

Should you have more questions about the session/event please email me at [masked] or call me at[masked]
name: Vihangam Yoga and Meditation session in Brussels

group.name: Live peacefully with Yoga, Meditation, Spirituality Brussels

description:
Dear members,

Imagine a day starting with Vihangam Yoga and India's ancient most meditation and ending with a cup of Masala Indian Tea !! That too in the studio which is filled with Indian architecture. How nice your day would be after that ??  I am going to conduct a session on Vihangam Yoga Brahmavidya and Meditation (the science of consciousness) which will help us to know about relief management and philosophy of life.  Yoga is not about gymnastic which is the widely prevalent concept. It is about how to live life more effectively and efficiently. Interested people are requested to join. You will also get chance to get friendship with others !!

The advantages of the Vihangam Yoga meditation are:

Better sleep
Maintains the blood pressure
Strengthen the nervous and immune systems
Lowers stress
Balances emotions
Develop compassion and loves
Terminates addiction to alcohol, smoking and drugs
Brings clarity to the mind
Improves eye sight
Makes you realize the true form of your inner self etc. etc.

Yoga Mat will be provided !!

Please sign up  If interested, please drop me an email.

For queries: [masked],[masked]

Thank You !! Hope to see you during meditation class !!
name: Vihangam Yoga and Meditation classes in Brussels

group.name: Live peacefully with Yoga, Meditation, Spirituality Brussels

description:
Dear members,

Imagine a day starting with Vihangam Yoga and India's ancient most meditation and ending with a cup of Masala Indian Tea !! That too in the studio which is filled with Indian architecture. How nice your day would be after that ??  I am going to conduct a session on Vihangam Yoga Brahmavidya and Meditation (the science of consciousness) which will help us to know about relief management and philosophy of life.  Yoga is not about gymnastic which is the widely prevalent concept. It is about how to live life more effectively, efficiently and nonetheless spiritually. Interested people are requested to join. You will also get chance to get friendship with others !!

The advantages of the Vihangam Yoga meditation are:

Better sleep
Maintains the blood pressure
Strengthen the nervous and immune systems
Lowers stress
Balances emotions
Develop compassion and loves
Terminates addiction to alcohol, smoking and drugs
Brings clarity to the mind
Improves eye sight
Makes you realize the true form of your inner self etc. etc.

Yoga Mat will be provided !!

You will have to bring 9 Euros so that we can pay for the room rent and then rest will go for charity for world peace and harmony !!

Please sign up  If interested, please drop me an email.

For queries: [masked],[masked]

Thank You !! Hope to see you during meditation class !!
